name: Seismic Toss
description: You attempt to throw a creature into the ground with tremendous force. Make a melee attack roll. On a hit, deal an amount of fighting damage equal to 1d6 + the userâ€™s level. Seismic Toss results in a critical hit on 19s and 20s.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d4+Level at level 5, 1d12+Level at level 10, and 4d4+Level at level 17.

contest.effect: An appealing move that can be used repeatedly without boring the audience.
